title: Lassen Volcanic National Park: Park Newspaper
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     News     Park Newspaper               Park Newspaper          Summer/Fall 2016 Edition The special centennial edition of the park newspaper, Peak Experiences, offers information on centennial event, campgrounds, hiking trails, and backpacking.   Download the summer/fall 2016 edition of Peak Experiences (2.7 MB, pdf).  Â       Winter 2015/2016 Edition The winter edition of the park newspaper offers information winter activities, ranger-led snowshoe walks, ski and snowshoe routes, and winter travel. This edition features the park centennial in 2016.  Download the winter/spring 2015-2016 edition of Peak Experiences (2.1 MB, pdf).
